PairAndStatus

Class CheckStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • PairAndStatus.CheckStatus

  • public class CheckStatus
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will handle checking the status of your BLE device, detect if data is being received and check for the BLE device's battery status with an Android phone.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CheckStatus()
      Default constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getPayload()
      Returns a 16-byte data packet received from the BLE device.
      boolean isRecievingData(java.lang.String payload)
      Receives data and checks it for its validity.
      java.lang.Double parseDataForBatteryStatus()
      Parses the 16-byte payload coming and finds the battery status of the BLE device.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CheckStatus

        public CheckStatus()
        Default constructor

    • Method Detail

      • isRecievingData

        public boolean isRecievingData(java.lang.String payload)
        Receives data and checks it for its validity.
        Parameters:
        payload - The 16-byte payload received from the BLE device.
        Returns:
        Returns true if data is currently being received and false if the data is not received.

      • parseDataForBatteryStatus

        public java.lang.Double parseDataForBatteryStatus()
        Parses the 16-byte payload coming and finds the battery status of the BLE device.
        Returns:
        A Double representing the Battery Status.

      • getPayload

        public java.lang.String getPayload()
        Returns a 16-byte data packet received from the BLE device.
        Returns:
        A String representing the 16-byte payload.
